definitions.definition: An animal condition in which there is partial loss of pigmentation resulting in white , pale , or patchy coloration of the skin, hair, feathers, scales or cuticle, but not the eyes (caused by a reduction in multiple types of pigment , not just melanin ).

main_definition: ( zoology , pathology ) An animal condition in which there is partial loss of pigmentation resulting in white , pale , or patchy coloration of the skin, hair, feathers, scales or cuticle, but not the eyes (caused by a reduction in multiple types of pigment , not just melanin ).
